QuestData.Title: Safeguarding the Watchers
QuestData.Description: In your travels, you might have encountered some of the expedition's watchers. They do the majority of the field work: documenting the unique inhabitants of the marsh, collecting samples, and making contact with sentient species.$B$BThe safety of the watchers is paramount, $c. We've had to recall the watchers we sent to explore Funggor Cavern to the south, because of marshbeast attacks. Warden Hamoot believes that killing their leader, Lord Klaq, will bring a swift end to the attacks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Lord Klaq and return to Windcaller Blackhoof at the Cenarion Refuge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you located and dealt with Lord Klaq?
QuestData.RewardText: You have my gratitude, $n, and that of the watchers. They will be heartened to hear that they can continue their work to the south without fear of attack.
